creators.name: Coffeezilla
creators.description: Internet detective exposing fake gurus, crypto scams, and online fraud. Known for deep investigative journalism into the biggest scams in tech and crypto.

creators.name: Kitboga
creators.description: Scam baiter who wastes tech support and refund scammers' time using hilarious character acting, fake banks, and elaborate setups.

creators.name: Jim Browning
creators.description: Cybersecurity expert who hacks into scam call centers, accesses their CCTV, and exposes their operations to law enforcement. Helped bust 2000+ scammers in Dubai.

creators.name: Pleasant Green
creators.description: Scam baiter who engages with romance scammers, marketplace fraudsters, and online con artists, turning the tables with creative setups.

creators.name: ScammerPayback
creators.description: Pierogi reverse-hacks scammers' computers, deleting their files and disrupting their operations while exposing their victim lists.

creators.name: Mark Rober
creators.description: Former NASA engineer who uses his engineering skills to combat porch pirates and expose scam call centers with elaborate traps.

creators.name: SomeOrdinaryGamers
creators.description: Mutahar exposes internet scams, fake reviews, NFT fraud, and shady practices in the tech world.

creators.name: VICE
creators.description: Documentary-style coverage of romance scams, pig butchering operations, and the global fraud industry.

creators.name: ColdFusion
creators.description: In-depth documentaries covering the biggest financial frauds, Ponzi schemes, and corporate scandals in history.

creators.name: Trilogy Media
creators.description: Undercover investigations into scam operations, confronting scammers face-to-face and exposing their tactics.

creators.name: BBC
creators.description: Investigative documentaries covering the biggest financial frauds and crypto scams worldwide.

videos.title: Exposing a $10,000,000,000 Debt Industry
videos.creator: coffeezilla
videos.description: Coffeezilla investigates the predatory debt relief industry that preys on desperate people, exposing a $10 billion scheme.

videos.title: Exposing a Romance Scammer
videos.creator: coffeezilla
videos.description: Coffeezilla goes deep into the world of romance scams, tracking down and confronting scammers who prey on the lonely.

videos.title: Exposing the Gambling Epidemic
videos.creator: coffeezilla
videos.description: Investigation into the explosive growth of online gambling and how it's destroying lives, with shadowy operators dodging regulation.

videos.title: Stealing $21,000,000 From Melania Trump and MAGA
videos.creator: coffeezilla
videos.description: How insiders made millions from the Melania Trump memecoin while regular MAGA supporters lost everything.

videos.title: I Got This Celebrity Scammer to Confess
videos.creator: coffeezilla
videos.description: Coffeezilla confronts a celebrity crypto scammer and gets them to admit to defrauding fans.

videos.title: Argentina's Memecoin Disaster Is Worse Than You Think

videos.description: The $LIBRA memecoin promoted by Argentina's president Milei — insiders made $113M while regular people lost everything.

videos.title: Investigating MrBeast

videos.description: Deep investigation into MrBeast's crypto activities, NFT trades, and allegations of insider trading with KSI.

videos.title: Exposing Andrew Tate's Crypto Grift
videos.creator: coffeezilla
videos.description: How Andrew Tate used his massive following to pump and dump crypto tokens, leaving fans holding worthless bags.

videos.title: Logan Paul Sued Me

videos.description: Logan Paul files a defamation lawsuit against Coffeezilla — the story behind CryptoZoo and Liquid Marketplace fraud.

videos.title: I Got Bribed By Casinos, But I Exposed Them Instead

videos.description: CS2 gambling sites offered Coffeezilla $20K to attack rivals — he exposed the entire corrupt industry instead.

videos.title: Deception, Lies, and Valve

videos.description: Part of the CS2 gambling investigation — how Valve enables a massive underage gambling ecosystem.

videos.title: The Dark Side of Counter-Strike 2
videos.creator: coffeezilla
videos.description: Exposing the shadowy CS2 skin gambling underworld — billions flowing through unregulated casinos targeting kids.

videos.title: The Bank That Won't Let You Withdraw
videos.creator: coffeezilla
videos.description: Investigation into a bank that traps customers' money and refuses withdrawals, using legal loopholes.

videos.title: Coffeezilla The Movie
videos.creator: coffeezilla
videos.description: The full story of how Coffeezilla became YouTube's most feared scam investigator — from engineering student to internet detective.

videos.title: The largest ARREST of scammers in the world!

videos.description: Jim Browning's investigation leads to the arrest of 2,000+ pig butchering scammers in a single Dubai raid — the biggest scam bust in history.

videos.title: Infiltrating BANK SCAMMERS
videos.creator: jimbrowning
videos.description: Jim Browning hacks into a bank impersonation scam call center, accessing their CCTV and exposing the operation from the inside.

videos.title: Inside a Pig Butchering Scam
videos.creator: jimbrowning
videos.description: Jim infiltrates a pig butchering compound in Southeast Asia, documenting the human trafficking and forced labor behind crypto romance scams.

videos.title: Disrupting a scammer for a WHOLE WEEK
videos.creator: jimbrowning
videos.description: Jim Browning maintains access to a scammer's system for an entire week, documenting everything and protecting victims in real time.

videos.title: They want you to MISDIAL
videos.creator: jimbrowning
videos.description: Exposing how scammers set up fake customer service numbers hoping you'll misdial — then steal your banking info.

videos.description: Raw audio recording of a bank impersonation scam in progress — hear exactly how these criminals manipulate victims.

videos.description: Jim Browning investigates fake job scams that lure desperate job seekers into handing over personal data and money.
